pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, February 12, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr will visit the Winnipeg Transit Fort Rouge Garage, and make a transit infrastructure announcement. A media availability will follow.

Winnipeg Transit Fort Rouge Garage
421 Osborne Street            

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for announcement and media availability
    • Media are asked to arrive via the visitor entrance no later than 4:15 p.m., and register in the main administration building.
    • Media will have access to visitor parking.
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca.
